name: Pixel Dungeon (itch) (CmSpeedrunner)
description: Pixel Dungeon is a wild, mind-blowing dungeon platformer unlike any other! Dash, weave and jump through these levels at any pace you choose! Pixel Dungeon blends dungeon gameplay with intricate platformer mechanics unlike any before it! Pixel Dungeon is sure to blow your socks off! Available on ALL operating systems, you don't want to miss out on the latest installment in the Pixel Series, Pixel Dungeon.
